title: Scientists Work to Teach Robots How to Have More Heart
description: A computer lab is using virtual therapy, autonomous vehicles, and rescue bots like this robot dog to bridge the gap between humans and machines. (Rebecca McElhoe/Purdue University)

title: ChatGPT Co-Creator Says the World May Not Be ‘That Far Away From Potentially Scary’ AI

title: Lawsuit Claims Patent Infringement by Apple Watch Models

title: Use Facebook and Instagram For $11.99 Per Month as Zuckerberg Launches Paid ‘Verified’ Subscriptions

title: Researchers Scrutinise Cellphone Use in US Churches
